overview: A new Action Move created by Francesco Fanelli full of twists and splendid women. An international cast involving among others Bambola, Big Willy and black mark in an intertwining between Italian and Chinese mafia police. Despite an exemplary career, even the best agents suffer the charm of easy earnings and when it comes to getting their hands on a priceless briefcase ... All that money that would repay the labors of a life of risk and no recognition but ...
title: The Bad Ways: Strade Perverse
